abstract: Some New York City taxis, after years of complaints, now feature televisions equipped with updated technology, making it easier for passengers to turn down the volume; cabbies and passengers welcome the changes.
snippet: Several new features — a lower default volume, a relocated volume button, a tutorial on the mute button — will make it easier for taxi passengers to silence their televisions.
lead_paragraph: Several new features — a lower default volume, a relocated volume button, a tutorial on the mute button — will make it easier for taxi passengers to silence their televisions.

headline.main: You Can Take Your Fingers Out of Your Ears: Quieter Taxi TV
headline.print_headline: You Can Take Your Fingers Out Of Your Ears: Quieter Taxi TV
headline.seo: Taxi TV Turning Down the Volume
